timeout.title: Authorization timeout
timeout.description: The authorization process timed out. Please try again.

progress.wait_for_authorization:
To authenticate, open the following URL and login at Actron Air:
{verification_uri}
If the code is not automatically copied, paste the following code to authorize the integration:

```{user_code}```


The login attempt will time out after {expires_minutes} minutes.

error.oauth2_error: Failed to start OAuth2 flow. Please try again later.

init.description: Configure options for the Actron Air integration.
init.title: Actron Air Options

reconfigure.description: Update your Actron Air account credentials.
reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Actron Air Account

stale_auth.title: Actron Air authentication expired
stale_auth.description:
The authentication for your {name} Actron Air account has expired. This can happen if you changed your password or the token has expired.

Please click the 'Fix' button below to re-authenticate with your Actron Air account.

confirm.title: Confirm repair
confirm.description: Do you want to apply this repair?
